Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.ControllerGUI

Class ConnectionPlayer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.ControllerGUI.GenericController
it.polimi.ingsw.view.ControllerGUI.ConnectionPlayer
public class ConnectionPlayer extends GenericController
ConnectionPlayer class is the controller of the scene of the connection and login of the player

    activeWindowRMI(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
    activeWindowRMI method is invoked whenever the player clicks on the button of the RMI connection type.

    activeWindowSocket method is invoked whenever the player clicks on the button of the socket connection type.
    void
    clickedButtonConnection(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
    clickedButtonConnection method is used to send the type of connection that was chosen by the player, with all the ip and port information written in the appropriate spaces

    clickedButtonNumPlayers method is used to set the number of players of the game when the mouse clicks on the button depicting the preferred amount of players expected in the game.

  • Method Details

    • enteredButton

      public void enteredButton(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      enteredButton method is used to enlarge the button when the mouse is over it
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - - the event of the mouse (in this case, entering the field of the button)

    • exitedButton

      public void exitedButton(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      exitedButton method is used shrink the button back to its original size when the mouse exits the button
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - - the event of the mouse (in this case, exiting the field of the button)

    • exitedButtonConnection

      public void exitedButtonConnection(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      exitedButtonConnection is the type of connection the player has chosen, between socket and RMI. The choice is made by pressing on either pulused to store.
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - - the event of the mouse (in this case exiting the field of the button)

    • clickedButtonConnection

      public void clickedButtonConnection(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      clickedButtonConnection method is used to send the type of connection that was chosen by the player, with all the ip and port information written in the appropriate spaces
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - - the event of the mouse (in this case, clicking on the button)

    • clickedButtonNumPlayers

      public void clickedButtonNumPlayers(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      clickedButtonNumPlayers method is used to set the number of players of the game when the mouse clicks on the button depicting the preferred amount of players expected in the game.
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - - the event of the mouse (in this case, clicking on the button)

    • clickedButtonUsername

      public void clickedButtonUsername(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      clickedButtonUsername method is invoked whenever the player clicks on the 'OK' button of the username window. It gets the username typed by the player and passes it to the commandParsing.
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - - the event of the mouse (in this case, clicking on the button)

    • activeWindowSocket

      public void activeWindowSocket(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      activeWindowSocket method is invoked whenever the player clicks on the button of the socket connection type. It sets the type of connection to socket and enlarges the windows so that the player can type the port and IP.
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - - the event of the mouse (in this case, clicking on the button)

    • activeWindowRMI

      public void activeWindowRMI(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      activeWindowRMI method is invoked whenever the player clicks on the button of the RMI connection type. It sets the type of connection to RMI and enlarges the windows so that the player can type the port and IP.
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - - the event of the mouse (in this case, clicking on the button)
